teamData.name: RUTH IJERE
teamData.about: As co-founder and CEO of Mindafrik, Ruth Ijere is a visionary leader in the mental health industry. With a deep understanding of the challenges that people face when seeking therapy, Ruth together with her team has created a platform that is making a real difference. Under Ruth's leadership, our team is committed to providing a high-quality, convenient and accessible therapy service that is helping people to overcome their challenges and live happier, healthier lives.

teamData.name: ENOR AGOFURE
teamData.about: As  Co-founder and CPO of Mindafrik, Enor Agofure is responsible for building the company's brand and reputation, as well as forging strategic partnerships. With her unique combination of legal and marketing skills, Enor is a valuable asset to any organisation looking to navigate the complex legal and business landscape of the digital age. Enor Agofure is a lawyer with over five years of experience and a digital marketer.
